body:
Comment 1: 
The spec makes it clear that the 'recurseB' identifier on the right of the := is in a
different scope from the one on the left. That is, it is impossible for a variable
declaration to mention the variable being declared in the initialization expression.
There is actually a significant amount of code that depends on this property.

The workaround you have is the resolution.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
